ComicInfo.Title: Leatherhead Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Turtles return to the Technodrome to monitor the revival of the Utroms. They are surprised to meet a new mutant there— Leatherhead! Will the mysterious mutant be friend or foe?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Mateus Santolouco | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Pablo Tunica | 2 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Ronda Pattison (c) | 3 | RE | Eastman Fun Club Edition Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 11:41:33. [CVDB521213]
ComicInfo.Writer: Kevin Eastman, Bobby Curnow, Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Kevin Eastman, Mateus Santolouco, Pablo Tunica, Ronda Pattison
ComicInfo.Characters: Ch'rell, Donatello, Fugitoid, Harold Lillja, Jennika, Kitsune, Krang, Leatherhead, Leonardo, Master Splinter, Metal Head , Michelangelo, Raphael, Sergeant Granitor, The Rat King, Traag
ComicInfo.Teams: Foot Clan, Foot Elite, Native Americans, Pirates, Rock Soldiers, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Utroms
ComicInfo.Locations: Burnow Island, New York City, New York State
